briefTitle: A 40-week Study to Evaluate TNX-102 SL 5.6 mg Taken Daily at Bedtime in Patients With PTSD
officialTitle: A 40-week Open-Label Extension Study to Evaluate TNX-102 SL 5.6 mg Taken Daily at Bedtime in Patients With PTSD
summary: Evaluate the long-term safety of TNX-102 SL 5.6 mg taken daily at bedtime over an additional 40 weeks in patients with PTSD who have participated in a double-blind lead-in study and completed an initial 12-week open-label extension study (TNX-CY-P303).

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Newly Emergent Adverse Events
